10 pk=49152:restore:print"{clr}"
20 reada:ifa<0then35
30 pokepk,a:pk=pk+1:goto20
35 ns=1
40 dima$(ns)
50 lo=5
55 co=10
60 ba=0
65 gr=81
70 ul=1
75 rv=32
95 ps=0
100 a$(1)="MCmicrocomputer__________"
200 fort=1tons:a$=a$(t)
201 l=len(a$):ifl>26thena$=left$(a$,26)
205 ifl<31thena$=" "+a$:l=l+1:goto205
210 poke760,0:ifps>0thenpoke760,1:poke761,ps
220 poke766,ul
230 poke765,gr
240 poke764,lo
250 poke763,ba
260 poke762,co
265 poke49494,rv
270 fory=1tol:poke678+y,asc(mid$(a$,y,1))
280 nexty:poke678+y,0
285 poke53272,21
290 sys49152
300 poke49325,0:nextt
310 end
